website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a slip leash, this is the right choice for you. Otherwise, there be another more versatile model on our list (for walking and training) that you would prefer.
pros: Slips on and off with ease
Made of strong, braided nylon for flexible control
Effective for gentle training activities, field trials, and crate or cage transfers
cons: It's not practical for many uses – it's not recommended for extremely rambunctious or very small dogs
Not as secure as a leash/collar combination

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, dimensions were not listed.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality leash, but no dimensions were given for the diameter of the cord so it is too thick for my purpose. I donated it to National Mill Dog Rescue for the larger dogs, I volunteer there with the smaller dogs & wanted a good training leash that's not too thick. It would help if the company included the size of the cord & not just the length on their site. It came in great condition, new & I like the leather parts & the suppleness of the cord, the price is fair & that's why I didn't return it. I would buy from this company again if they were more specific in listing the sizes.
customer_reviews.author: SueLG

customer_reviews.title: Two Years Later and this is still our primary leash
customer_reviews.text: We have several leashes for our 45lb Labradoodle and this is definitely the one he prefers and the best one to use when we take him out. Its been left outside in the elements a few times and the green color has faded a bit, but after two years, the nylon mesh has not frayed nor has the stitching on the leather come off. Just a great leash overall. My father in law who is nearing 70, loves how light the leash is compared to the leather ones we have, easier to carry and control the dog with. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Montigue

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This slip lead is a nice quality, soft, and sturdy. Can't beat it for the price! Here's a tip, make a figure 8, so that one loop goes over the dog's snout and the other loop behind the head with the leather stopper. You'll have absolute control of a wild dog. You can find directions on the internet. Made a huge difference in walking my dog and she learned to heel almost instantly. After walking a few times, I slowly went back to using it as a normal slip lead. Would definitely purchase this product again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F.

customer_reviews.title: So High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I like this leash so much that I only use it on days where my dog and I go somewhere fancy. It looks so nice and high quality! The only trouble is adjusting the hole to loop over your dog's head. You have to shimmy the brown strap up the leash by twisting so that you can make more room but it wasn't that much of a problem for me. It also looks very good on my dog and he hasn't been straining against the leash anymore. Highly recommend and it's definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I take my son's puppy (60lbs) to the dog park and beach, it is SO MUCH easier to slip this over her neck to take her to the car and back! she gets excited and wiggles too much to clip an ordinary leash onto her collar, so this type lead is the answer. I lost one and found the local big name retail store had only poor quality leads for double the price. A dog will chew through almost anything IF YOU ALLOW it! This type of lead is no meant to be left dangling on the dog while it is at home, in the car, or anywhere it could chew on it. Just sayin...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Works great & very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I like this leash & recommend it for anyone with a dog that likes to tug. I don't do choke chains or shock collars, I feel like this is a healthy medium. The veterinarian tells me it can damage their throat, but I don't always have a collar on my dog & this is a convenient option while in public. My dog definitely doesn't pull as hard while this is on him & I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Master Blaster 727

customer_reviews.title: Excellent slip leash
customer_reviews.text: This slip leash has walked many, many, many shelter dogs of all sizes and shapes. It is washed on a regular basis and has held up well. I have purchased several for other shelter volunteers to use and they are always a favorite. There is not a negative thing to be said about these great, affordable leashes. This slip leash does just what it is supposed to do and is strong and well made. I won't even bother to order any brand of leash.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: No kink Slip
customer_reviews.text: I occasionally help with rescue transports and have had opportunity to use this when trying to get the pup moved from one place to another, or simply to take a quick walk. The slip does a great job. No twisting or kinking when the dog is less than cooperative. Easy adjustment for slide size when adjusting for a large sized dog then back down to a medium sized dog. Is holding up really well in less than ideal conditions. I would purchase again without thinking twice.
customer_reviews.author: Scablo

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Lead
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality adjustable lead. Very solidly made. I don't use these much for my own dogs, but I always carry one in my car in case I find a lost or stray that needs some help getting out of traffic or something. The adjustable nature of this lead allows me to fit a variety of dog sizes with a single lead. Also, it is sturdy enough for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy This
customer_reviews.text: Good quality...my dog does not really respond to the pull-discipline aspect. But that is probably totally on my dog. She is a bitch..too smart for her own good. This leash has a really great length and its sturdy. I can see this lasting for a long time. I like the color, it brings out the eyes. Not really. You won't know how you dealed without this. It's super easy to just loop it over their heads. I would say good for a dog of any age.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice leash for a very large dog!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this leash is easy to use and very flexible, yet strong enough for my boxer/mastiff mix, who is about 100 pounds. My husband doesn't like it because it doesn't control her as much as her chain collar does. However, we got it to use with a training collar that can emit small shocks when the dog disobeys, so once we start using that, it may be fine. It is definitely a nice leash, at any rate.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne K. Endres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these leashes! I keep one I'm my car in case I find a dog on the side of the road and I use it when I volunteer at local shelters. It's easy to get on and off the dogs quickly but at the same time makes it easier to control the bigger dogs that yank. It's also long enough that you can loop it under the arm pits of the escape artist dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great leashes...  easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I wanted something that wouldn't "deteriorate" in salt water and salt air. These will not, but they dn't stay on when in the water either...so do what you may. If they dn't swim in the ocean, they are great but I have to keep them leashed, even if on a 60 foot clothes line. They just don't stay on the dog in water...but that's my problem
customer_reviews.author: Sally S

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash!
customer_reviews.text: Our rambunctious 120lb GSD is well managed (for his safety) with this leash. The cord is thick enough to handle his strength & weight. the thinner cord tends to bite into my hand which is more training for the user than the dog. as it is, this leash is perfect! Thanks for a great design & quality!
customer_reviews.author: KimOrDave Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily, wish the “stop” worked
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our 50 lb mastiff puppy. We walk daily and work on walking with a loose leash. Even so, the “stop” that lets you set the tension doesn’t really stop it unless you’re barely tugging. One hard tug and the leash gets pretty tight. Luckily, that doesn’t happen often with our training.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Z

customer_reviews.title: She is sweet and gentle
customer_reviews.text: Leash is very strong and soft, both for me and dog. Have a german shepard and something much bigger mix. Just rescued at age two, very energetic. The leash/collar is being used for walks in town around lots of people. She is sweet and gentle, but her size and energy and oversize police dog look scares people. Does not get very tight around neck, but gives me a little more control as is shorter than most, and very soft to hold. Only drawback is that it feels like the rope toys she loves to chew up. I will have to keep it put up.
customer_reviews.author: ruraldoc

customer_reviews.title: Leash it
customer_reviews.text: Much better then a harness in my opinion, they can't pull as much and it helps to train a dog to stay by your side and not walk in front of you as long as you put it on under their neck and right on top of their head. Sounds like on odd pace for it to sit but it makes it so they can't choke themselves, looks more like how you'd walk a dog at a dog show but works well if you have a little patience.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jade

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice & seems to be made of quality material
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice & seems to be made of quality material, however, both me & my husband got blistered from walking our new dog with this leash. You might be able to prevent blisters if your dog already works nicely but we specifically bought this leash as a training leash (to teach him to work nicely).
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and stiff.
customer_reviews.text: This leash wasn't the miracle-worker I expected. While I did appreciate the stopper to prevent the loop from getting super loose, it just doesn't function well. The leash is too long, too thick, and too rigid. My dog kept pulling hard and coughing. The loop wouldn't stay high on his neck - or if it did I would have to hold the leash very short. Maybe he's just stubborn... but this leash didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great dog Training leash!
customer_reviews.text: This leash is exactly what you need if your dog pulls. It puts pressure on their neck and reduces pulling. These training leashes are the only type we will use. The Remington leashes are well-made, good-looking and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mantracker

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a tendency to pull ... a lot, during walks. After reading Cesar Millan's books where he recommends this type of lead, I thought I'd give it a try & it works like a charm. A few gentle sideways corrections & my 65 lb. pup walks like a show dog. No more red hands after a walk from the leash. Also, the material is nice & soft too.
customer_reviews.author: ccs93Top Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality ... great price. My old one wore out, took quite a few years and several puppies chewing on it to accomplish its destruction .. very happy to have found another Remington leash! I now have a German Mastiff (Great Dane :) .. 12 weeks old, already 40 lbs and a handful - I am not a collar user (I have a baby collar with my dogs tags on it that I carry with me) the rope leash is quick to put on, easy on the hands.. as well as providing a 'softer' control during leash training and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy leash
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet if it solves the pulling problem, but it is certainly a substantial leash - very tight weave, and sturdy. First use was a success as pulling was reduced. So I am hopeful. Regardless of my pulling results, the leash is well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: great slip leash
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this purchase! my dog used to pull ! with this slip leash doesn’t now! position it like suppose too which i watched a video to correctly put on big difference walking now recommend big time
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The answer to pulling. No other leash ive tried works as well. The "noise" is comfortable and tightens when the dog pulls. She stops pulling and it loosens. Not a miracle but better than the regular leash and vet recommended
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Erlandson

customer_reviews.title: ... at a doggie day care and this leash works great! It is strong enough to be safely used ...
customer_reviews.text: I work at a doggie day care and this leash works great! It is strong enough to be safely used with the big dogs and still not too heavy to use on the little dogs. I use this almost daily at work to walk all kinds of dogs from the large breeds like German Shepherd and Newfoundland to small breed like Yorkies and Malteses. I have felt safe and comfortable with this leash and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bainer-Montano

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash. It's easy to put on and take off. It doesn't require a collar. It's extremely well made, sturdy, good looking, and will last a long time. What more do you want in a leash?
customer_reviews.author: Allen E. Shinder

customer_reviews.title: strong sturdy rope
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like this leash the only thing I wish was better is the length. I think its 6 feet but it could be around 8 ft. for a good length. Other than that it's very convinent and sturdy. The rope is pretty strong I definitely would not worry about it breaking or frailing. My dog likes to pull a lot while walking her (she is 60 lbs) and it holds up well. For a slip leash I think it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy well-made leash. It didn’t work out for my dog, but that’s not the leash’s fault. I prefer using a harness over this leash, but if you need a slip leash then I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good leash
customer_reviews.text: This was great for our 75 pound doberman. She learned to walk without pulling with this leash as it would tighten (but not to the point where it would hurt) if she pulled on the leash. We could buy it again. That being said, this is not the type of leash you want to leave on the dog if the dog is left alone.
customer_reviews.author: Goos

customer_reviews.title: The best leash for loose walk
customer_reviews.text: The best leash we ever had for my German Sheppard. It helped to teach her loose leash walking in 2-3 weeks. Easy to put on her, it doesn’t go down during walk, so it stays in a proper position. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jane P.

customer_reviews.title: This leash is a wonderful training tool for my super energetic 40 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: This leash is a wonderful training tool for my super energetic 40 lb dog, as it allows me to give her gentle physical cues and redirections. My only complaint is that the "leather" parts have sharp corners, and I've actually cut myself on the handle when my dog was pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash for giant breed dogs!
customer_reviews.text: These leashes or so wonderful, I bought another one. I have a 150 lb. Newfie and this is the only leash that allows me to control her when she sees something "interesting" ... one quick tug to the side and her focus is back on me and not the rabbit or cat that ran across the yard.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseIona

customer_reviews.title: ... my 65 pound pit bull mix and it's been great. The rope is strong
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a year with my 65 pound pit bull mix and it's been great. The rope is strong. My dog would always try to hide when I put a metal choker chain on her. With this leash I just hold it out and she stick her head through the loop which tells me that it is comfortable for her. She seems better behaved with this leash and easier to control. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: moell1043

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash! Slip leads are my choice in nearly every situation, and this one is quite stylish looking. People tend to remark about how nice it looks. Works perfectly as intended. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dogs who Pull
customer_reviews.text: We are transitioning from a prong collar for our overly excitable 2 year old 55lb pittie mix. She's a doll but on walks she tends to pull and being pregnant I need this behavior to stop. There is only so far you can get with treats. So far this is nice cause its easy to put on, sturdy and a perfect length. Plus it looks really nice. I'd say the quality isn't the best but for the price well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Best leash ever for both dog and handler...
customer_reviews.text: I've had several dogs and have always used a leash with metal choke collar. This leash is wonderful - no more dealing with 2 separate parts, very well constructed, nice leather touches, and so lightweight you hardly feel it, and is probably more comfortable for the dog also. A real winner!
customer_reviews.author: Dononlake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well - easy to use with rambunctious labs who swim. Dries quickly and easy to place over their heads. Wears well - terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Marketing Associates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick potty trips and everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Flexible enough for comfortable walking. Stiff enough to maintain a loop shape and easily slip over a dog's head. Length is right on the money. We use it for both our small and large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: AmznCust

customer_reviews.title: My go-to leash
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my main leashes for our smaller version bull mastiff. It's VERY sturdy and easy to use. You place these kinds of leashes on your dog by making a "P" with the loop before slipping it over their head. I really like this, plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as stated
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't prevent pulling from large breeds. My gaints Schnauzers will pull right along. And at one point the loop loosen and my dog ran off. I was able to get her back but OMG she almost got in traffic. Dont use this for bad walkers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for! Something that goes ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've been looking for! Something that goes up wraps around her neck and it has a little padding so that you can gently you pull up on her when you want her attention not not back when you're training a dog that most people just pull back and that is not the proper way to do it it just makes your dog pool more forward so I just been looking for one of those types of slip leashes and I found one times 10 is patted on my end and hers so it's a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice training leash
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and half the price of the local pet store. I’ve only used it for a day, so cant comment on longevity yet, but seems sturdy. I got it for training, and it has been useful so far.
customer_reviews.author: Desertgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash for Shelter Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at the animal shelter and this one has been sturdy. The locking mechanism doesn't slide too easily, which keeps the loop around the dog's neck secure. Nicely constructed leash that doesn't give me rope burn, especially when I've got the leash on a dog that tends to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Lt.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: we run a dog rescue. bought at least four of these so far. very handy. well made. definitely recommend and we will definitely be back for mor.
customer_reviews.author: j L

customer_reviews.title: Great quality leash. Dog likes it too.
customer_reviews.text: I think the leash will last a long time. This is well-made. Easily slips over my dog's neck. My dog is not tempted to drag me with him on his walks.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J.

customer_reviews.title: nice job
customer_reviews.text: i like it, puppy hates it. she cant rip it, escape from it, run past its length. i am in control. great for leash training when you are making constant micro adjustments. hopefully she will graduate back to the chest harness, but for now, its a great way to tame your crazy pup challenging your boundaries. good quality, i appreciate the leather touches.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzaro

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for training
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used slip leads before and love them but this one didn’t do it for me. The leather slide keeps sliding off. I have to keep pulling it up to keep it tightened behind my dogs ears. If you don’t intend to use it for training then it’s good otherwise I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Value
customer_reviews.text: I adore leash! It fits perfectly and gives me complete control. It's extremely well made and will last for a very, very long time! I recommended this to a friend who bought two for her dogs, and she in turn recommended it to another who bought one for their dog. Very good product!!
customer_reviews.author: FrugalNut

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We hired a trainer for our 4 dogs and she strongly recommended a slip style leash. We couldn't find a solid one at the big box pet stores so naturally I went to Amazon. These are very well made and strong leashes. They work great. In fact, our trainer normally uses Cesar Milan products but complimented these and was surprised by the price.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable leash.
customer_reviews.text: I walk dogs at the local animal shelter, and I wanted a comfortable alternative to the leashes that were provided. This has saved my wrists from the pooches that don't know how to walk nice on a leash. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NBTX

customer_reviews.title: Nice leash. I don't like putting a collar on ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice leash. I don't like putting a collar on my dogs, and this is easy to slip on their heads when we go out for a walk. Second time buying this leash (first one got chewed up). Good quality. Best part is, my shibas can't wiggle their ways out of it.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leash. Easy to hold, it feels strong, as well as able to ensure dog is safe and secure, love how I can loop over his head and behind his front legs as needed. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cook

customer_reviews.title: Gives you a good grip if you need to train a dog from ...
customer_reviews.text: They use these at the shelter where we adopted our Pointer/Lab mix 60lbs. Gives you a good grip if you need to train a dog from pulling, jumping, lunging, etc... I like it as an extra tool(leash) to choose from depending upon what we are doing. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I volunteer for the shelter and this lead is great! Many dogs have been walked with this lead ...
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer for the shelter and this lead is great! Many dogs have been walked with this lead and its proven its durability. Most of the dogs are anxious to get out so they pull a lot and its never failed me. Great for a strong, heavy dog. I like it much better than my regular leads with the clip at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality strong leash...comfortable too.
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality leash. Very comfortable to hold and the slide works great. Good quality leather parts and sewn together very well. I would definitely recommend this leash. I use it on an oversize Sheltie 25lbs but it would a 100+ lb dog with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Very nice slip leash
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at an animal care center and walk every kind of dog from chihuahua to pit bulls and this leash works great on all of them. Also it is sturdy and the rings and leather don't wear out from all the rubbing on the kennels like some others I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great tug toy but do not want my dog to ...
customer_reviews.text: The rope is stiff and hard to adjust around the neck. I have switched to a lighter leash which is easier to close and open at the neck. Makes a great tug toy but do not want my dog to think of her leash as a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen A.

customer_reviews.title: Used at pitbull shelter with great results!
customer_reviews.text: High quality slip lead. At the pitbull shelter this type is always sought after among the volunteers for walks because we've yet to see one break and the noose size lock slider is helpful to prevent back-outs. Rugged enough to survive a tug of war session with some of the more anxious dogs or untrained volunteers.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Using on Pitbull and Shepard
customer_reviews.text: We have been useing this trainer for about three months now . We've used it on our blue nosed Pitbull , he does very well , he's about 61lbs . Well worth the money so far , very happy with it . We ended up buy a second for our Shepard. One think u have to watch for , the sliding leather keeper that keeps the loop around his neck where he cant slip out of it , has twice now ended up on the other side of the loop. But it's only happened when removing it from the dog not while in use ,
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hobbick

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at a local County animal shelter, and this lead gets plenty of rough use! It's strong, durable, and just the right length for the larger dogs!
customer_reviews.author: ChazW

customer_reviews.title: hurt my hand, real rough
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my female hands are too soft? In any case, felt like i was hurting my dog. there goes another one in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jucelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging and fast ship. This collar is perfect for anyone who has a dog that is not good about walking with a leash. It pulls tighter if they try to pull away or do not follow you. Once they stop pulling, it losens. We have a 90lb lab, still a puppy, and I have used this on jom twice amd now he walks fine with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Hribal

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality slip-lead; it's well made using quality materials. It's so well made, in fact, that I suspect it will outlast me and the dog.
customer_reviews.author: M. Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash. I’ve bought these several times. They are heavy duty, easy to use. Wish it had reflection on it like others I’ve used but very happy otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Tamra L Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Great running leash
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my truck so that I always have a leash that doesn’t need a collar. I Absolutely loved it so I got another one for Daily use over standard leashes. It’s Super comfortable to hold on runs!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy leash. The slip leash makes it easy to teach your dog to stay close to you. It's thicker than the one I purchase from Cesar Milan's line.
customer_reviews.author: D. AtKinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed very "hard" but after a quick break in, I have been nothing but pleased. This product is durable, well built, and a great tool to help train my dog. Even he has gotten so used to it, that he wants it on to go out with it on. I highly recommend this leash!
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: its GREAT! so easy to slip on and go for ...
customer_reviews.text: its GREAT! so easy to slip on and go for a walk.. And, unless he gets real excited over someone, he seems to love it too. I dont think he feals it like a regular leash so it tames that needing to pull??? sounds weird but thats how it seems.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: It's also super easy to use because you can slip it on ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a rock climbing caribiner and attach it to a prong collar. It's also super easy to use because you can slip it on for quick potty trips. My dog is relentless on walks (45lbs) and this has held up to keep in in check. He's knawed at it a bit and there are no frays or looks of distress. I've been using it for about 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah21

customer_reviews.title: Durable long lasting slip leash
customer_reviews.text: As a dog trainer this has been my favorite tool for years but the one I just recieved is different. The metal piece is a circle rather than a half circle, so it can slip over the leather piece holding the leash tight on the dogs neck. This is very disappointing. I hope you switch back otherwise I will have to find a new product, as I supply my clients with leashes.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect experience!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my purchase from Coastal Pet Products. We have 2 Great Pyrenees over 100 lbs each and the leashes we bought from Coastal Pets are perfect for their daily walks. My order was processed quickly and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable; effective for training
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and well made. Strong and easy to use. I recently adopted a doberman who was difficult to walk and this leash has helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: jenm

customer_reviews.title: My favorite slip leash!
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the leash- smooth but easy to grip. Works great for walks and training.
customer_reviews.author: UTTexan

customer_reviews.title: Really like the function
customer_reviews.text: Neat leash. Really like the function. Wish I would have bought something thicker so that it didn't choke out the pups as rough. I only use it for night time quick potty now.
customer_reviews.author: yanelle

customer_reviews.title: This one is sturdy. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Came fast. I bought another brand which fell apart in a week. This one is sturdy. Works great. Dean Gould - Author: Rise to the Top, How to become a Great Leader, Manager, and Mentor
customer_reviews.author: Dean Gould

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Leash
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our 15lb puppy. Nice alternative to clip-based leash around the house. Especially useful to use as a lasso when only one hand is available. Obviously, you cannot leave dog unattended with this leash as it's easy to slip out of when no pressure is used on the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. LeCour

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle, very helpful. It helps my dog during training, since it release easily while my dog is relax and tighten when she pulls. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: OMedina

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash. It’s great for training to heal. It’s sturdy and I feel very in control when we go for walks. I would definitely recommend it. I have had it a long time and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Oops!
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally bought this slip lead intending on purchasing their normal version. Kept it anyway because it's still a great product and we use it intermittently for our older dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable in the hand. Useful too in our shelter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials, but we quickly learned this type of leash should be made of thinner rope. Its so thick that it slips down off of his neck and ends up closer to his shoulders, where we have less control over him during walks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyna

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our pet shelter
customer_reviews.text: I walk dogs at a shelter. This is the kind of lead that they recommend. The wide rope feels better on the dog's neck. They are also simpler to use than a thin lead. It is high-quality, will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Adman

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on the real thing!!
customer_reviews.text: The collar for this lead will not stay up around the dog's ears as recommended for maximum control of your dog by Cesar Millan - it falls to the dog's neck, which per Cesar, actually encourages the dog to pull you.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leash!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for trips to the Vet as well as short walks outside. We use the longer leashes for long walks so our pups can better explore everything.
customer_reviews.author: BandD

customer_reviews.title: The perfect leash for my purpose which is to walk my ...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect leash for my purpose which is to walk my dog while I am on a mobility scooter. The leash is short enough that I do not need to worry about the dog running in front of the scooter. Also the leash is soft enough that the dog is not hurt when I restrain it when it wants to chase a squirrel or a rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Boersig

customer_reviews.title: Very good leash
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Sturdy. Easy to slip on. Even washes well in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Training aid
customer_reviews.text: This is a good leash for training the dog to walk next to you. And it’s easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash!
customer_reviews.text: These leashes are awesome! Usually this style is only available in 4' length but with big dogs with big necks the 6' length is perfect. They are so much easier to control with this high neck collar - they dragged us around by their harness for too long! A great price and two day shipping made the purchase even better!
customer_reviews.author: Lois in Akron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just easy to use. dog doesn't need a collar for this to work, so it's perfect for catching strays
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slip lead
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this leash .... I love it ! It's super convenient because it is a slip lead meaning it can be used as a leash and a collar , plus there's no way dogs can slip out of it . It's quality material and so far has held up well!
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Good Product  Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sturdy and well made leash. I was more than pleased with it. I purchased it after a recommendation from a rescue group so they must have found it reliable also.
customer_reviews.author: Nefinds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lead is very high quality and works great on my 90 lb Rotweiller.
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leash! Great neutral colors and I love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leash! Great neutral colors and I love the fact that it is a slip dog leash versus the typical clip. I've washed it a few times in the washing machine and its held up well. Looks brand new! I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: RRach

customer_reviews.title: Rope much thinner than specs
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because the amazon listing misrepresented size as 72x1x1 whereas the rope in this leash is at most 1/2 inch wide. I wanted a larger rope so it would be more comfortable for dog and owner. Also the “soft nylon” is not as soft as similar products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best leash I’ve bought and best decision ever made for ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even think, just get it. I’m gonna save you some time on shopping/looking around. The best leash I’ve bought and best decision ever made for my little furry friend. Very good quality and reasonable pricing!!!
customer_reviews.author: long ng

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this leash for a full year now and it has held up flawlessly. There's no real signs of wear, no rust on the metal, and I even lost it outside in the snow for a night. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: The leash seems easy on the neck
customer_reviews.text: I am not really using it for the intended purpose, but for what we use it for, it has worked very well. The leash is easy to hold, should last a very long time, and has performed miraculously
customer_reviews.author: mark ochs

customer_reviews.title: Best Slip Lead by Coastal Pet Products DCPR0216GRW Nylon
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for to use when transporting dogs from Atlanta, GA to Chattanooga, TN. They hold up really well and just do the job. Purchased another color and I use them for my 3 personal dogs. I just love them!!! Just slip over their head and go on a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D Satterlee

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This lead is soft to touch, easy to handle and very sturdy and durable. The length is great and doggie likes it!!
customer_reviews.author: Abundance of Zen

product_meta.title: Coastal Pet Products DCPR0216GRW Nylon Remington Rope Slip Dog Leash, 6-Feet, Green/White
product_meta.description: Coastal Pet Remington rope slip dog leash is a great tool for field trials and crate transfer. Made of soft, braided nylon material. The flexibility of this leash makes them easy to fold for carrying or storage. carefully and neatly finished for comfort, appeal and durability. The slip collar style leash, recommended by trainers, allows for quick, yet gentle correction and has a leather slide that adjusts the collar to fit any size neck. Available in green/white color checked with leather trim. Measures 6-feet length.
feature_bullets: Remington rope slip dog leash is a great tool for field trials and crate transfer
Made of soft, braided nylon material
The flexibility of this leash makes them easy to fold for carrying or storage
Allows for quick, yet gentle correction and has a leather slide that adjusts the collar to fit any size neck
Available in green color checked with leather trim; measures 6-feet length

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
